replies.body:
- Be _me _
- Delays wedding
- My soon to be wife is furious at me!
- Told her it's because i needed clash in my life just as much as her
- I lost both of them by 8pm Friday
- **mfw.jpg**
 {{summoner:3}}

Even if it works fine on saturday night, how many games are going to be forfeits because people have given up or lost hope in playing clash? Whole teams may have abandoned league because of this MASSIVE hiccup
I mean... it's been one day...

I got so excited for the clash, my heart was bumping so fast when I hear the countdown.
My disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
It would be nice if there was some compensation for this...
Come on，why the displayborad shows we were losing 1 game？
Swear you clowns can't get anything right ay!
